org.wso2.carbon.identity.oauth2.client.authentication

Class BasicAuthClientAuthenticator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wso2.carbon.identity.core.handler.AbstractIdentityHandler
      • org.wso2.carbon.identity.oauth2.client.authentication.AbstractOAuthClientAuthenticator
        • org.wso2.carbon.identity.oauth2.client.authentication.BasicAuthClientAuthenticator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.wso2.carbon.identity.core.handler.IdentityHandler, OAuthClientAuthenticator

    public class BasicAuthClientAuthenticator
extends AbstractOAuthClientAuthenticator
    This classs is esponsible for authenticating OAuth clients which are client id and secret to authenticate. This authenticator will handle basic client authentication where client id and secret are present either as Authroization header or in the body of the request.

        Extracts client id and secret from Authorization header.
        Parameters:
        authorizationHeader - Authroization header.
        oAuthClientAuthnContext - OAuth Client Authentication context.
        Returns:
        An array which has client id as the first element and secret as the second element.

        OAuthClientAuthnException
